participant_1.background:
I'm more comfortable in my casual clothes than in formal wear.
I am a successful novelist, but my mother is still worried about my horror novels.
i have two siblings.
i wish i could spend more time at home.
I'm struggling with school but I'm happy with my family.

participant_2.background:
I'd have lunch with my dog, because she's always there for me, no matter what.
i do not like vegetables.
i can also squat 400 pounds.
I enjoy listening to all sorts of music, and I love sharing my favorites with my students.
I like to go to car shows and corvette forums online to learn more about my car and see what other people are doing with theirs.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you doing today?
I'm doing pretty good as well. I'm a little tired, but I'm good overall.
That's good to hear! I'm glad you're doing well.
Thanks. So, what do you like to do for fun?

I enjoy listening to all sorts of music, and I love sharing my favorites with my students. I also like to go to car shows and corvette forums online to learn more about my car and see what other people are doing with theirs.
That's really cool! I'm not very musical myself, but I do enjoy listening to music. I've never been to a car show, but I've always wanted to go.
You should definitely go to a car show sometime! It's a lot of fun to see all the different types of cars and learn about them.
I definitely will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! So, what do you do for a living?
Oh, that's awesome! I love reading! What kind of novels do you write?
Oh, that's cool! I've never read a horror novel before, but I'm always up for trying new things.
You should definitely give one of my novels a try! I think you'd like them.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
